p:
Au(III) has a high reduction potential and can be reduced by phenolic compounds from the natural extracts
42 . In this study, we produced gold nanoparticles (AuNPs) with BRP extract (AuNP extract) and its fractions (AuNP hexane, AuNP dichloromethane, AuNP ethyl acetate) using the green synthesis method. In order to increase the solubility of the compounds present in the extract, the pH of the mixture of gold solution with the propolis extract was adjusted to 7.0. Moreover, this pH alteration is also involved in the activation of phytochemical compounds, which facilitates the donation of electrons to the metal, reducing Au 3+ to Au 0
42 .
